subject: Seed-Stage AI Infrastructure Startup with Strong Metrics - TechStartup Inc.
body: Dear Jane Smith, I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to reach out to introduce you to TechStartup Inc., an AI infrastructure company that I founded and lead as CEO. Our mission is to build next-generation AI infrastructure that empowers businesses to leverage the full potential of artificial intelligence and machine learning. I was particularly drawn to VC Partners due to your focus on AI and SaaS, and I believe that our company aligns well with your stage preference of Seed and Series A investments. I would like to share some of our recent metrics with you: - Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR): $50k - Growth: 15% MoM - Customers: 100+. Our strong growth and customer base demonstrate the market opportunity for our AI infrastructure solutions. We are experiencing increasing demand from businesses seeking to harness the power of AI, and I am confident that our technology is well-positioned to meet this need. I would be delighted to schedule a call to discuss our company in more detail, share our product roadmap, and answer any questions you may have. Please let me know if this is of interest to you. Thank you for considering TechStartup Inc. for potential investment. I look forward to the opportunity to speak with you soon. Best regards,  John Doe TechStartup Inc. CEO and Founder johndoe@techstartupinc.com (123) 456-7890
